mapper.select: select brand_id, brand_name, brand_url, brand_des, create_by, update_by, create_time, update_time, remark1, remark2 from supplymarketing.gd_brand where brand_id = #{brandId}
select brand_id, brand_name, brand_url, brand_des, create_by, update_by, create_time, update_time, remark1, remark2 from supplymarketing.gd_brand
mapper.insert: insert into supplymarketing.gd_brand(brand_name, brand_url, brand_des, create_by, update_by, create_time, update_time, remark1, remark2) values (#{brandName}, #{brandUrl}, #{brandDes}, #{createBy}, #{updateBy}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime}, #{remark1}, #{remark2})
mapper.update:
update supplymarketing.gd_brand
brand_name = #{brandName},
brand_url = #{brandUrl},
brand_des = #{brandDes},
create_by = #{createBy},
update_by = #{updateBy},
create_time = #{createTime},
update_time = #{updateTime},
remark1 = #{remark1},
remark2 = #{remark2},
where brand_id = #{brandId}
